verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall make a <S%H6381>singular<s%> <S%H5088>vow,<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> shall be for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by thy <S%H6187>estimation.<s%>

And thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> of the <S%H2145>male<s%> from twenty years <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8141><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> even thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> be a <S%H5347>female,<s%> then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be from five years <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H8141><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> of the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be from a month <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H2320><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> of the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be from sixty years <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H8346><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and <S%H4605>above;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it be a <S%H2145>male,<s%> then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for the <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> be <S%H4134>poorer<s%> than thy <S%H4480>estimation,<s%> <S%H6187><s%> then he shall present <S%H5975>himself<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> him; according <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H834><s%> his <S%H5381>ability<s%> <S%H3027><s%> that <S%H5087>vowed<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6186>value<s%> him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be a <S%H929>beast,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> <S%H4480><s%> men <S%H7126>bring<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> any man <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> such unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

He shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2498>alter<s%> it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4171>change<s%> it, a <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H7451>bad<s%> for a <S%H2896>good:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> he shall at all <S%H4171>change<s%> <S%H4171><s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> for <S%H929>beast,<s%> then <S%H1931>it<s%> and the <S%H8545>exchange<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4480><s%> they do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H7133>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then he shall <S%H5975>present<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> it, <S%H996>whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad:<s%> as thou <S%H6187>valuest<s%> it, who art the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it <S%H1961>be.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> he will at all <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H1350><s%> it, then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof <S%H5921>unto<s%> thy <S%H6187>estimation.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>estimate<s%> it, <S%H996>whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>estimate<s%> it, <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he that <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> it, and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his.

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> some part of a <S%H4480>field<s%> <S%H7704><s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> then thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> according <S%H6310>to<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> thereof: a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be valued at <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> he <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> from the <S%H4480>year<s%> <S%H8141><s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> according to thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> it shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> unto <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H6310><s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H3498>remain,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> and it shall be <S%H1639>abated<s%> from thy <S%H4480>estimation.<s%> <S%H6187><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he that <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> will in any wise <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H1350><s%> it, then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> it, and it shall be <S%H6965>assured<s%> to him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

But the <S%H7704>field,<s%> when it goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2764>devoted;<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> a man <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%> which he hath <S%H4736>bought,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> of the <S%H4480>fields<s%> <S%H7704><s%> of his <S%H272>possession;<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> unto <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H4373>worth<s%> of thy <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3104>jubilee:<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H6187>estimation<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> as a holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H834>him<s%> of <S%H4480>whom<s%> <S%H854><s%> it was <S%H7069>bought,<s%> even to him to <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> did belong.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6187>estimations<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> according to the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H8255>shekel.<s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> the <S%H1060>firstling<s%> of the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> should be the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1069>firstling,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it; <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H7716>sheep:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> then he shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> it according to thine <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of it <S%H5921>thereto:<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1350>redeemed,<s%> then it shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> according to thy <S%H6187>estimation.<s%>

Notwithstanding <S%H389><s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> devoted <S%H2764>thing,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2763>devote<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath, both of <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H929>beast,<s%> and of the <S%H4480>field<s%> <S%H7704><s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> or <S%H1350>redeemed:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%> is most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

None <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2764>devoted,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be <S%H2763>devoted<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%> shall be <S%H6299>redeemed;<s%> but shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> whether of the <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> or of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's:<s%> it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> will at all <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H1350><s%> aught of his <S%H4480>tithes,<s%> <S%H4643><s%> he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H5921>thereto<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof.

And <S%H3605>concerning<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> or of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> even of <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H5674>passeth<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

He shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1239>search<s%> <S%H996>whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H4171>change<s%> it: and <S%H518>if<s%> he change it at <S%H4171>all,<s%> <S%H4171><s%> then both <S%H1931>it<s%> and the <S%H8545>change<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy;<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H1350>redeemed.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
